page.title: 10Rogation Sunday 1985
page.content: In the afternoon we had a United Rogation Sunday Service which started off at the Lych Gates.There were 22 adults and 3 children.The vicar,Mr. Urquhart,and the Methodist Minister, Mr.Brant,led the service.We began with the Lord's Prayer and the hymn"All things bright.."Then we walked up to High Well at the top of Humphreygate where we sang"We plough the fields.." It was very windy up there but no one minded.They blessed the crops.Mr.Brant read a lesson and preached the sermon. After that we sang"When I needed a neighbour.." Mr.Hawley said that many years ago people got their drinking water from High Well.Back at the Lych Gates,we said another prayer and sang another harvest hymn.The vicar gave the blessing and then we all went home.
